thread.section_title: Le Parisis Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday get away
thread.title_full: Birthday get away - Review of Le Parisis Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: holly9419
title: Birthday get away
text:
I stayed here at the beginning of the month for my birthday and had a great time! I was hesitant about booking a room with an Eiffel Tower view because I was worried I'd get there and hardly be able to see it but I wasn't disappointed. Our room was on the third floor and you couldn't see that much of the Eiffel Tower but it still made it feel really special. You could see it from the bed and at night seeing it lit up and the light going round was amazing.
The room was lovely, well decorated, a great size and nice and clean (and the rain shower is amazing!)
The staff at the front desk were all really friendly and helpful.
We didn't have breakfast at the hotel or use any facilities other than in our room so I can't comment on that but I would definitely recommend this hotel.
